languages.text:
For every 10% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost while wearing no {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, Argenta gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and at the start of each turn +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are removed at the end of combat.
Additionally, while wearing no armour, Argenta's resolve is increased by +2 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} and by +6 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Bonuses from injuries and traumas are removed after healing.

traits.locale_text:
For every 10% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost while wearing no {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, Argenta gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and at the start of each {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are removed at the end of combat.
Additionally, while wearing no armour, Argenta's resolve is increased by +2 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} and by +6 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Bonuses from injuries and traumas are removed after healing.

For every 10% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost while wearing no {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, Argenta gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and at the start of each turn +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are removed at the end of combat.
Additionally, while wearing no armour, Argenta's resolve is increased by +2 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} and by +6 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Bonuses from injuries and traumas are removed after healing.

For every 10% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost while wearing no {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, Argenta gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and at the start of each turn +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are removed at the end of combat.
Additionally, while wearing no armour, Argenta's resolve is increased by +2 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} and by +6 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Bonuses from injuries and traumas are removed after healing.

languages.text:
За каждые 10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, потерянного, пока на Ардженте нет {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g}, она получает +5% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и в начале каждого хода +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}. Все {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} исчезают по окончании боя.
Также, пока на Ардженте нет брони, ее решимость увеличивается на 2 за каждое {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранение{/g} и на 6 за каждую {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травму{/g}. Бонусы от ранений и травм исчезают после исцеления.

All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are removed at the end of combat.
Additionally, while wearing no armour, Argenta's resolve is increased by +2 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} and by +6 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Bonuses from injuries and traumas are removed after healing.

traits.locale_text:
За каждые 10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, потерянного, пока на Ардженте нет {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g}, она получает +5% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и в начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}. Все {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} исчезают по окончании боя.
Также, пока на Ардженте нет брони, ее решимость увеличивается на 2 за каждое {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранение{/g} и на 6 за каждую {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травму{/g}. Бонусы от ранений и травм исчезают после исцеления.

За каждые 10% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, потерянного, пока на Ардженте нет {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g}, она получает +5% к наносимому {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и в начале каждого {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}. Все {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонусы{/g} исчезают по окончании боя.
Также, пока на Ардженте нет брони, ее решимость увеличивается на 2 за каждое {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}ранение{/g} и на 6 за каждую {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травму{/g}. Бонусы от ранений и травм исчезают после исцеления.

languages.text:
当阿洁塔没有穿戴任何{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}时，每当损失10%{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，阿洁塔造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}就会提高5%，额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，且每回合开始时都会获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于+<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}</u>。上述所有加成效果在战斗结束之后都会消失。
此外，当阿洁塔没有穿戴任何护甲时，每处{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}都会让她的决心提高2点，每处{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}都会让她的决心提高6点。伤势与创伤带来的加成会在治愈后移除。

All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are removed at the end of combat.
Additionally, while wearing no armour, Argenta's resolve is increased by +2 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} and by +6 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Bonuses from injuries and traumas are removed after healing.

traits.locale_text:
当阿洁塔没有穿戴任何{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}时，每当损失10%{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，阿洁塔造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}就会提高5%，额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，且每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时都会获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于+<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}</u>。上述所有加成效果在战斗结束之后都会消失。
此外，当阿洁塔没有穿戴任何护甲时，每处{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}都会让她的决心提高2点，每处{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}都会让她的决心提高6点。伤势与创伤带来的加成会在治愈后移除。

当阿洁塔没有穿戴任何{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}时，每当损失10%{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，阿洁塔造成的所有{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}就会提高5%，额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，且每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时都会获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于+<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}</u>。上述所有加成效果在战斗结束之后都会消失。
此外，当阿洁塔没有穿戴任何护甲时，每处{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}伤势{/g}都会让她的决心提高2点，每处{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}都会让她的决心提高6点。伤势与创伤带来的加成会在治愈后移除。

languages.text:
Für jeweils 10 % verlorene {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} ohne {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} erhält Argenta +5 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und zu Beginn jedes Zuges +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}. Alle {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} werden am Ende des Kampfes entfernt.
Trägt sie keine Rüstung, wird Argentas Entschlossenheit für jede {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} um +2 und für jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g} um +6 erhöht. Boni aus Verletzungen und Traumata werden nach der Heilung entfernt.
languages.original_text:
For every 10% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost while wearing no {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, Argenta gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and at the start of each turn +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are removed at the end of combat.
Additionally, while wearing no armour, Argenta's resolve is increased by +2 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} and by +6 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Bonuses from injuries and traumas are removed after healing.

traits.locale_text:
Pro 10 % an verlorenen {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g}, solange man keine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} trägt, erhält Argenta +5 % {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und zu Beginn jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}. Alle {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Boni{/g} werden bei Kampfende entfernt.
Zudem wird, solange man keine Rüstung trägt, Argentas Entschlossenheit für jede {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Verletzung{/g} um +2 und für jedes {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Trauma{/g} um +6 erhöht. Boni aus Verletzungen und Traumata werden nach der Heilung entfernt.

languages.text:
Pour chaque 10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} perdues lorsqu'elle ne porte pas d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}, Argenta obtient +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}, et, au début de chaque tour, +<u> de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g}</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Blessures temporaires{/g}. Tous les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} prennent fin à l'issue du combat.
De plus, quand Argenta ne porte pas d'armure, elle bénéficie +2 de Détermination pour chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lésion{/g} subie et +6 de Détermination pour chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g}. Les bonus découlant des lésions et des traumatismes disparaissent si elle reçoit des soins.
languages.original_text:
For every 10% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost while wearing no {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, Argenta gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and at the start of each turn +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are removed at the end of combat.
Additionally, while wearing no armour, Argenta's resolve is increased by +2 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} and by +6 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Bonuses from injuries and traumas are removed after healing.

traits.locale_text:
Pour chaque 10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} perdus lorsqu’elle ne porte pas d’{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g}, Argenta gagne +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g}, et, au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, +<u> de {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g}</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Blessures temporaires{/g}. Tous les {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} prennent fin à l’issue du combat.
De plus, quand Argenta ne porte pas d’armure, elle bénéficie +2 de Détermination pour chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}Lésion{/g} subie et +6 de Détermination pour chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumatisme{/g}. Les bonus découlant des Lésions et des Traumatismes disparaissent si elle reçoit des soins.

languages.text:
Por cada 10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} perdidas sin llevar {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}, Argenta gana +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}, y al principio de cada turno gana +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}. Todas estas {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} se pierden al terminar el combate.
Además, mientras no lleve armadura, la firmeza de Argenta aumenta en +2 por cada {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g} y en +6 por cada {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g}. Las bonificaciones por lesiones y aflicciones se eliminan al curar la causa.
languages.original_text:
For every 10% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost while wearing no {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, Argenta gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and at the start of each turn +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are removed at the end of combat.
Additionally, while wearing no armour, Argenta's resolve is increased by +2 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} and by +6 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Bonuses from injuries and traumas are removed after healing.

traits.locale_text:
Por cada 10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} perdidas sin llevar {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}, Argenta gana +5 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}, y al principio de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} gana +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}. Todas estas {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificaciones{/g} se pierden al terminar el combate.
Además, mientras no lleve armadura, la firmeza de Argenta aumenta en +2 por cada {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión{/g} y en +6 por cada {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g}. Las bonificaciones por lesiones y aflicciones se eliminan al curar la causa.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を装備していない状態で失った{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が10%に達するごとに、アルジェンタは{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を+5%、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を+1、{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を+<u>各ターンの開始時に{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}解消{/g}</u>する。全{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は戦闘終了時に取り除かれる。
さらに、アーマーを装着していない間、アルジェンタの決断力は{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}1つにつき、+2され、{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}1つにつき、+6される。負傷や外傷による報酬は、治癒後に取り除かれる。
languages.original_text:
For every 10% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost while wearing no {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, Argenta gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and at the start of each turn +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are removed at the end of combat.
Additionally, while wearing no armour, Argenta's resolve is increased by +2 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} and by +6 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Bonuses from injuries and traumas are removed after healing.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を装備していない状態で失った{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が10%に達するごとに、アルジェンタは{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を+5%、{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を+1、{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}を+<u>各{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時に{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}解消{/g}</u>する。全{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}は戦闘終了時に取り除かれる。
さらに、アーマーを装着していない間、アルジェンタの決断力は{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}負傷{/g}1つにつき、+2され、{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}1つにつき、+6される。負傷や外傷による報酬は、治癒後に取り除かれる。

languages.text:
Argenta, hiç {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} giymezsen kaybettiği her %10 {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanında +%5 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} ve +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır. Turu her başladığında da +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g}</u> değeri kadar {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı elde eder. Çatışmanın sonunda tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslar{/g} ortadan kalkar.
Ayrıca hiç zırh giymezsen Argenta'nın kararlılık değeri, her {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlık{/g} için +2 ve her {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travma{/g} için +6 artar. Sakatlık ve travmalardan gelen bonuslar, iyileştikten sonra ortadan kalkar.
languages.original_text:
For every 10% of {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} lost while wearing no {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, Argenta gains +5% {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, and at the start of each turn +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} are removed at the end of combat.
Additionally, while wearing no armour, Argenta's resolve is increased by +2 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}injury{/g} and by +6 for each {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}trauma{/g}. Bonuses from injuries and traumas are removed after healing.

Turu her başladığında da +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g}</u> sağlık puanı elde eder. Çatışmanın sonunda tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuslar{/g} ortadan kalkar.
Ayrıca hiç zırh giymezsen Argenta'nın kararlılık değeri, her {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}sakatlık{/g} için +2 ve her {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}travma{/g} için +6 artar. Sakatlık ve travmalardan gelen bonuslar, iyileştikten sonra ortadan kalkar.
